sections.Delay Management & Accountability: Indecimal positions a system-driven approach to on-time delivery using an integrated project management system, daily tracking of projects, instant flagging of deviations, automated task assignment, and penalisation to reinforce accountability.
sections.Website-Level Customer Assurance Stateme: The public website highlights transparent pricing, real-time project tracking dashboards, fixed timelines with penalties for delays, branded materials, on-site quality checks, long-term maintenance plans, and structural warranty positioning.

sections.One-line Summary: Indecimal provides end-to-end home construction support with transparent pricing, quality assurance, and structured project tracking from inquiry to handover.
sections.Operating Principles: The company focuses on smooth construction experience, competitive pricing, strict quality assurance, stage-based contractor payments, and transparent live tracking.
sections.FAQs: Indecimal provides real-time construction progress visibility with live photo updates, transparent pricing with no hidden surprises, and stage-based contractor payments released after verified completion.

sections.Structure Specifications: Steel, cement, aggregates, block work, RCC mix, and ceiling height specifications are defined with clear quality and pricing limits.
sections.FAQ Notes: Wallet amounts act as spending caps. Brand upgrades are customizable at additional cost. Exact brands may vary based on equivalence.
